names.english: clear the upper (burner) decoction with saposhnikovia
names.commonEnglish: Clear the Upper (Burner) Decoction with Saposhnikovia Clear the Upper and Guard the Wind Decoction

actions: Releases the Exterior and expels External Wind.
With Jing Jie, expels Wind and stops itching for Exterior patterns in any season, pruritic rash and initial-stage boils.
With Bo He, Jing Jie, Huang Qin and Lian Qiao, for Wind-Heat.
With Bo He, Jing Jie and Lian Qiao, for Wind-Heat with red eyes and a sore throat
With Bo He, Huang Qin, Huang Lian and Lian Qiao, for acne due to Wind-Heat Attacking the upper body.
Clears Heat (especially in the Upper Jiao), relieves toxicity, reduces abscesses and clears Blood Heat.
Expels Phlegm, benefits the throat, expels pus and opens and raises Lung Qi, directing the effects of other herbs to the upper body.
With Gan Cao, for Excess disorders in the Upper Jiao with no disorder in the Lower Jiao.
With Gan Cao and Huang Qin, for hoarseness, pain and swelling of the throat due to Wind-Heat.
With Bai Zhi, for ulcerated abscess where pus is being discharged slowly.
Expels Wind, eliminates Dampness, unblocks the nasal passages, dispels Cold, reduces swelling, eliminates toxins, expels pus and alleviates pain.
With Chuan Xiong, for headache.
With Huang Qin, for Wind-Heat headache.
Clears Heat, dries Dampness, drains Fire, detoxifies, cools the Blood and stops bleeding.
With Zhi Zi, for sores due to Heat toxin.
Invigorates the Blood, promotes the movement of Qi, expels Wind and alleviates pain.
Releases the Exterior, expels Wind, vents rashes and relieves itching.
With Bo He, disperses Wind in the head, vents rashes and alleviates itching.
Clears Heat, reduces Fire, eliminates irritability, drains Damp-Heat, cools the Blood, relieves toxicity, reduces swelling and activates the Blood.
With Huang Lian, Huang Qi and Lian Qiao, for boils and carbuncles.
Clears Heat, drains Dampness, drains Fire and resolves Fire toxicity.
With Huang Qin, drains pathogenic Heat from the Upper and Middle Jiaos.
With Huang Qin and Zhi Zi, for high fever, irritability, dry mouth and throat, and dark urine due to Fire toxin in the three burners.
Disperses Wind-Heat, cools and clears the head and eyes, benefits the throat and vents rashes.
With Jing Jie, for Wind-Heat.
Promotes the movement of Qi, reduces distention and pressure and resolves hardenings.
Clears Heat, relieves Fire toxicity and moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs.
With Jie Geng, for pain and swelling of the throat.
Clears Heat
Resolves toxicity
Expels Wind
Dispels Dampness
syndromes: Wind-Heat and toxins in the Upper Jiao
Interior Heat in the Upper Jiao

symptoms: Sores on the face and neck
Pimples on the face and neck
Boils on the face and neck
Suppurative infection of the head and eyes
Pain and burning sensation of the eyes
manifestations.pulse: Rapid or Strong or Floating and rapid

conditions.name: Acute eczema of the face and neck

contraindications: Not for long term use for adolescent acne.

modifications.purpose: vesicular rash on the face and head
